mapper.select: select ui.ucode uucode, ui.uatid uatid, ui.unickName unickName, ui.ubirth ubirth, ui.unation unation, ui.uintro uintro, ui.uloc uloc, ui.uimage uimage, ui.ustate ustate, ui.uonline uonline, f.fblockstate fblockstate from (select * from follow where fopcode = #{ucode} and ucode NOT in ( select fopcode from follow where ucode = #{ucode} )) f , user_info ui where ui.ucode = f.ucode
